title: Caleb Ewan Retires in Shock Statement: ‘What Once Felt like Everything No Longer Does’
content:
Multiple Tour de France stage-winner retires with immediate effect after two years of turbulence: 'It has taken a significant toll on my relationship with the sport.'

Read the full article at Caleb Ewan Retires in Shock Statement: ‘What Once Felt like Everything No Longer Does’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
